    1: <?php
    2: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Model\Template;
    3:
    4: /** String interpolation
    5: * @param String $str
    6: * @param Array $vars
    7: * @return String $interpolated_str
    8: */
    9: function Interp (String $str, Array $vars = NULL) {
    10: if ($vars) {
    11: return str_replace(
    12: array_map(function ($el) { return fmvar($el); }, array_keys($vars)),
    13: array_values($vars),
    14: $str);
    15: }
    16: return $str;
    17: }
    18:
    19: /** Extract template variables from raw content.
    20: * @param String $content
    21: * @param String $pattern
    22: * @return Array $variables
    23: */
    24: function Variables(String $content, String $pattern=NULL) {
    25: $regex = ($pattern) ? $pattern : '/'.fmvar('([\w_0-9]+)').'/';
    26: preg_match_all($regex, $content, $matches);
    27: return (sizeof($matches) > 1)
    28: ? array_merge(array_unique($matches[1]))
    29: : []
    30: ;
    31: }
    32: /** Format of tempate variables to be interpolated (ref. \Model\Yaml\Rc).
    33: * @param String $var_name
    34: * @return String $formatted_var
    35: */
    36: function fmvar(String $str) {
    37: return '%{'.$str.'}';
    38: }
    39:
